title: Plaka area Athens
text: The Plaka is an area that you meet when you get down from the Acropolice. Is is a very old sector of Athens, very alive, full of people, groups of players (guitars and such) walk around you. A lot of stores that sell things to tourists and locals. An interesting place- BUT WATCH OUT FOR THIEVES!!!! THERE ARE LOTS OF THE AND THEY ARE REAL PROFESSIONALS!!!! if your head is not connected to your body- they will steal that too....

title: A big must in Athens
text:
It is a place to be at sundown. the whole city is lit up, and the Acropolice is quite a view.
If you are not in a very good shape, Don't try to get to the train by stairs. Even the part to the beginning of the train is too much. Take a taxi. it cost very little. We paid 4 euros on the way down.

title: A must in Athens
text: We bought tickets ahead on the internet and saved a lot of time. The climb is a little tiring, but worth every effort. The ruins are a facinating view into the past. Do not miss it.

title: Great!
text: The location is very good, near the train station and very close to the metro. Quite rooms and very comfortable, good prices, very attentive staff. The last day we left at 5AM and the staff got us packed breakfast to take with us.

title: Cruise and dinner on Danube river
text: We took a cruise on the Danube river in the evening, with Dinner on board. A special experience that we enjoyed very much. We bought the tickets online before we arrived in Budapest and enjoyed an evening with live music, good local food and a nice tour of the city from the Danube.
place: Budapest Danube River Evening Sightseeing Cruise by Legenda City Cruises

title: A very impressive building that shows us the greatness of Hungary when it was built
text: Very impressive. The tour inside the building is a must. The stairs (lots of them) and the huge halls and rooms, the guards outside, very exceptional.

title: A place where the Nazi regime throw the jews to the river. very mooving
text: An important part of history. not to forget. A nation that does not remember her history- is a nation with no future. We must learn from history

title: beautifull bridge
text: The bridge connects the big market and the Vaci Utca to the other side of the Danube. On the other side you can find the Gellert baths and the bridge presents a great walk over the river

title: The square of heros
text: A beautiful square with statues of heroes of Hungary. We spent there about an hour and enjoyed it. There are statues in the center of the square and on the outside circle too.

title: A stroll on the bridge
text: A place to stroll on to cross the bridge, to see the boat passing under you and to walk to the other side and back

title: Romantic, Very nice
text: The boat ride can be with dinner or without. The second time we did it without dinner. It was very quite, rerlaxing and romantic. recommend it

title: Nice boat ride with excellent dinner and music. Very relaxing and very romantic.
text: Nice boat ride with excellent dinner and music. Very relaxing and very romantic. We were two couples, sat by the window and enjoyed it very much.
place: Budapest Danube River Dinner & Cruise from 7 pm

title: Great icecream
text: Just simply great icecream! A lot of flavores and both diet and non diet. There are some sitting places but most take it home. there are boxes thatare keeping cold

title: Great restaurant, good prices
text: A very good place to eat, great food and very reasonable prices. We go there quite a bit and enjoy every time!

title: A very special part of history
text: A great place where you can see the way the city was built in the Roman Empire days long ago. How they lived and how they traveled

title: great museium
text: great museum. very interesting. The items on display are really intresting and are to be seen at least once

title: Great flight
text: As always, on time, cheap, fast. A real pleasure considering the price- value for money. I use this company a lot. use a priority deal and a discount club member

title: fast, on time, cheap
text: cheap and satisfactory. on time. cordial. I was looking for a nonstop and cheap flight and is what ryanair gave me. did not need anything else for a short flight

title: Andre Rieu Concert
text: The world's best Show! in the open air with great music and thousant music lovers. Andre Rieu is giving the best show in the world

title: The worst hotel I've been in!
text: Ordered 3 double rooms month ahead. the room I got was a little smaller then a foxhole. when the door opened - no room for a trolly, the "double bed" a little wider then a trolly suitcase. When I complain- was told to leave and "he can rent it for much more". claimed that I ordered two double rooms and one single room. When I showed the reservation- for three double rooms- he told me to go to hell.. when I said that I will report it to booking.com - he fiscally through me on deck, injuring me badly. I am an old disabled guy/ Booking says that they can not help because I reported to the police and it is under investigation, Expected Booking.com to stand behind me - but they only offered me to go back to the boat to sleep there!!!!!

title: Beautiful and unique experience
text:
A very beautiful and unique experience. The ride in the water is great! Kids and adults enjoy it very much.
It starts with a standard tourist tour of Budapest and then splashing into the river and "driving"in the river for quite some time.. Enjoyed it very much.
